[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview-decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.md)

## harp-mapview-decoder package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TileDataSource](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasource.md) | Common base class for the typical \[\[DataSource\]\] which uses an \[\[ITileDecoder\]\] to decode the tile content asynchronously. The decoder can be passed in as an option, or a default asynchronous one is generated. |
|  [TileFactory](./harp-mapview-decoder.tilefactory.md) | Templated factory class to create instances of \[\[Tile\]\]. |
|  [TileInfoLoader](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileinfoloader.md) | Subclass of \[\[TileLoader\]\] which is used by \[\[TileDataSource\]\] to load the \[\[TileInfo\]\] meta data, not the tile data itself. |
|  [TileLoader](./harp-mapview-decoder.tileloader.md) | The \[\[TileLoader\]\] manages the different states of loading and decoding for a \[\[Tile\]\]. Used by the \[\[TileDataSource\]\]. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DataProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.md) | Interface for all <code>DataProvider</code> subclasses. The <code>DataProvider</code> is an abstraction of the tile loader which is only responsible for loading the binary data of a specific tile, without any relation to displaying or even decoding the data. |
|  [TileDataSourceOptions](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.md) | Set of common options for all \[\[TileDataSource\]\]s. |
